snippet: A California man says he has a photo of Mahler that has been missing from the Schoenberg archives for decades.
abstract: Los Angeles resident Cliff Fraser has contacted the family of Arnold Schoenberg seeking to sell them a missing signed picture of Gustav Mahler, one of the composer's most cherished possessions; Schoenberg family suspects photo was originally stolen, despite Fraser's claim that photo had been a gift to his grandfather, and is demanding it back.
lead_paragraph: A California man says he has a photo of Mahler that has been missing from the Schoenberg archives for decades.

headline.seo: A Clue to Whereabouts of Schoenberg’s Missing Mahler Photo
headline.main: Clue Arises Regarding Lost Photo of Mahler
headline.print_headline: Clue Arises Regarding Lost Photo Of Mahler
